data.title: CDFA Releases Final Environmental Impact Report for CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing Program
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The final program environmental impact report (EIR) for the CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing Program has been certified and is available for viewing at cdfa.ca.gov/CalCannabis/PEIR.html.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
